extendedInfo.description: Darts 3D is one of the best dart simulations available for android! It features a realistic aiming method and comes with 3D graphics.Game modes: Cricket, 501 (double out), 301 (double in & out).# Multiplayer (online)- Realtime gaming- Chat- Profile with statistics- Highscore and ranking- and much more!# Singleplayer- Vs. bot- Vs. local playerEnjoy the game and throw some darts!

reviews.title: Very good app.
reviews.comment: Very good ane entertaining app. Would be superb if they gave you more info on how to level up in points.
reviews.author: Evert Diaz

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Used to have a problem with browser launching to adds automatically but it\'s fine now. Thanks Carl, any plans for round the clock some time in the future?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super
reviews.comment: Now it is super
reviews.author: Goran Nikoloski

reviews.title: 3D Darts
reviews.comment: This dart game is addictive and incredible.. been playing it for 2 years and I don\'t even play another game BC its not worth my time and it just takes me away from the excitement and euphoric feeling i get from 3D darts. Thank u Carl Hopf.
reviews.author: David McLaren

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Dont dare report pornographical player profile pics or suggest anything to the developer that might make the app better otherwise you\'ll never reach top ratings
reviews.author: Neil Kylander

reviews.title: Nice App
reviews.comment: Nicely done darts game. Would be 5* if there were more different games, shanghai etc.
reviews.author: Chris Snelgrove

reviews.title: Sucks after I finally updated
reviews.comment: Can\'t even connect after I finally updated this app. Sucks until I can smash online again.
reviews.author: Chris Elshabassy

reviews.title: Use to give this game 5 stars
reviews.comment: I\'m so sick and tired of this stupid game never letting me log on. Extremely frustrating!! It just says \"connecting\" for hours at a time. It\'s a joke... played this game for a couple years and that\'s never changed, always been the same. You guys have responded and STILL no change. Why don\'t you guys at least try and make an effort on that? Or at least try and take care of our needs. This game is literally becoming a dang joke. Fun when you can actually play. I rate the game 5 but now a half star if I could.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent 3D dart game with intuitive yet realistic controls.  Suggestions: More games (Tactics, Round the Clock, e.g.), user options for dart colors and wall texture, \"Champion\" level (or make \"hard\" harder).  Bug: Time and turn info is truncated when the bot wins.  This is a really good game. I almost never rate games.
reviews.author: David Merritt

reviews.title: Game
reviews.comment: Good job done by the developer.  Looking for more simple and well working games
reviews.author: Kayomarz Bacha

reviews.title: Favorite game
reviews.comment: please fix connectivity issues or post status of any fixes that may be in progress so users are not left in the dark..
reviews.author: Jay Edward Manuel

reviews.title: Love it love it
reviews.comment: Great game for all ages..some little connection problems mid game but loving the new version..also seems to be less vulgarity in lobby while waiting on a game or automatch....Definately worth downloaded...A+++++++++++ :) 10 out of 10
reviews.author: Miss Jack

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Update:  working again.  Woohoo!   Used to be 5 star. Loved this game until last week.  They have server issues and haven\'t been able to connect to multiplayer since.  Please fix and get 5 stars again.  I have version 1.1.4 and its not working even though you say her its fixed.
reviews.author: Linette Klucas

reviews.title: Awful. I hate it.
reviews.comment: Awful. I hate it.
reviews.author: Charles Ware

reviews.title: Used to be better.
reviews.comment: I don\'t care for the new updates. And as for reporting someone don\'t bother. Nothing ever happens or gets resolved. The wrong people get banned for pointless acts.
reviews.author: Tabatha Cota

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Would like to see rank of opponent as I play him/her
reviews.author: Jeff Hoskins

reviews.comment: I needed to get 29 points and did so 3 times in a row. Then the 4 time I didn\'t get it but the not got it\'s numbers right 1 time and won. WTF  Rotten cheating game not.\tSucks
reviews.author: CJ Quillinan

reviews.title: I like this app\342\231\254
reviews.comment: I like dart games since a kid, this app is very good had in my previous android phone finally downloaded onto my current phone. 5\342\230\206
reviews.author: Van M

reviews.comment: was a five but since upgrade graphics screw up and sometimes when your going for aim it lurches to top
reviews.author: Tim Wilson

reviews.title: Challenging and fun
reviews.comment: Beat darts game out there. Fun challenging friends.
reviews.author: Greg Montalbano
